name: Chinese Chicken Salad from Stevia In The Raw®
author: In The Raw
summary: Chinese chicken salad complete with a sweet dressing using Stevia In The Raw.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Stevia In The Raw® Bakers Bag
3 cups roasted chicken breast, in bit-size pieces
1 (11 ounce) can mandarin orange sections, well drained
½ cup chopped green onions, green and white parts
directions: In a small bowl whisk together the vinegar, stevia, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, salt, pepper, and pepper flakes until the salt dissolves
Whisk in the canola and sesame oils
On a serving platter, arrange the napa cabbage in a bed
Arrange the chicken, then the orange sections on top of the cabbage
Pour the dressing over the salad
Sprinkle on the scallions, almonds, and sesame seeds, if using
Just before serving, toss to combine the layers
